content:
# The inspection of the entities on the map reveals that the stone furnace has 14 wood as fuel but is still showing warnings for "no ingredients to smelt." 
# This indicates that the furnace is indeed operational but lacks the necessary iron ore to smelt into iron plates.

# The current inventory shows:
# - 4 wood
# - 5 stone
# - 1 iron ore
# - 2 iron plates
# - 1 copper plate
# - 1 copper cable
# - 1 iron gear wheel
# - 1 electronic circuit

# Since the furnace has sufficient fuel, the next step is to gather more iron ore to allow the smelting process to proceed.

# I will locate the nearest iron ore resource and move there to gather additional iron ore.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Find the nearest iron ore resource.
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Move to the iron ore position.

# Now, I will harvest a sufficient quantity of iron ore.
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=5)  # Harvest a quantity of iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the updated inventory after harvesting iron ore.

# After gathering iron ore, I will return to the stone furnace and insert the iron ore for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=stone_furnace_entity, quantity=1)  # Insert 1 iron ore.

# Now, I will wait for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait.
    current_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)
    if current_inventory.get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 1:  # Wait until there is at least 1 iron plate.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout for iron ore - please check resources.")

# If successful, I will now attempt to extract the iron plate.
extracted_iron_plate = extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, position=stone_furnace_entity.position, quantity=1)

# Finally, I will attempt to craft the assembling machine if everything works as planned.
craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1, quantity=1)

# Checking the updated inventory after crafting the assembling machine.
print(f"Inventory after crafting assembling machine: {inspect_inventory()}")
